1st section.Framadate is an online service for plann: Framadate is an online service for planning an appointment or make a decision quickly and easily. No registration is required.
1st section.Define dates or subjects to choose: Define dates or subjects to choose
1st section.Send the poll link to your friends or co: Send the poll link to your friends or colleagues

2nd section.a software developed by the University: a software developed by the University of Strasbourg. Today, it is devevoped by the association Framasoft
2nd section.This software needs javascript and cooki: This software needs javascript and cookies enabled. It is compatible with the following web browsers:

3rd section.To participate in the software developme: To participate in the software development, suggest improvements or simply download it, please visit
3rd section.If you want to install the software for: If you want to install the software for your own use and thus increase your independence, we help you on:

Help text studs.php.If you want to vote in this poll, you ha: If you want to vote in this poll, you have to give your name, choose the values that fit best for you and validate with the plus button at the end of the line.

Step 2 choix_date.php.Choose the dates of your poll: Choose the dates of your poll
Step 2 choix_date.php.To schedule an event you need to propose: To schedule an event you need to propose at least two choices (two hours for one day or two days).
Step 2 choix_date.php.You can add or remove additionnal days a: You can add or remove additionnal days and hours with the buttons
Step 2 choix_date.php.For each selected day, you can choose, o: For each selected day, you can choose, or not, meeting hours (e.g.: \"8h\", \"8:30\", \"8h-10h\", \"evening\", etc.)
Step 2 choix_date.php.Copy hours of the first day: Copy hours of the first day

Step 2 choix_autre.php.To make a generic poll you need to propo: To make a generic poll you need to propose at least two choices between differents subjects.
Step 2 choix_autre.php.You can add or remove additional choices: You can add or remove additional choices with the buttons
Step 2 choix_autre.php.It's possible to propose links or images: It's possible to propose links or images by using
Step 2 choix_autre.php.Add a link or an image: Add a link or an image
Step 2 choix_autre.php.These fields are optional. You can add a: These fields are optional. You can add a link, an image or both.

Step 3.Confirm the creation of your poll: Confirm the creation of your poll
Step 3.Once you have confirmed the creation of: Once you have confirmed the creation of your poll, you will be automatically redirected on the administration page of your poll.
Step 3.Then, you will receive quickly two email: Then, you will receive quickly two emails: one contening the link of your poll for sending it to the voters, the other contening the link to the administration page of your poll.
